fieldUpdates.description: Amount Field updated from the Amount boxes

fieldUpdates.name: Approx SFDC Go Live Date is Close Date +

fieldUpdates.description:
NICC-027116 - This field update is used for Opportunities that have the "Partner" record type.
It sets the Oder Status field to "Complete" based on the Partner Live Date field.
fieldUpdates.name: Order Status Complete

fieldUpdates.description: Set Pricing Sheet Completed field on Opportunity to "No" when Pricing Sheet Needed = "Yes"
fieldUpdates.name: Pricing Sheet Completed set to No

fieldUpdates.description: Set SOW Needed field on Opportunity to "No" when SOW Completed = "Yes"
fieldUpdates.name: SOW Needed Set to No

fieldUpdates.name: Update "Stage Prior to Close Lost" field

rules.fullName: Alert Lee if a US %2425k Deal Won

rules.description: Amount is the equivalent of the amount boxes or products if the products exist.

rules.fullName: Create Task - Sales Order Opportunity - Closed Won%2FTentative Status
rules.description: When an opportunity is set to a Sales Order, with Closed Won or Tentative status, create a task to Michele O'Toole and email DL_Orders@newmarketinc.com (orders@newmarketinc.com)

rules.fullName: Email when Sales Engineering Resource is Needed
rules.description: Updated on 10/29/2012 by Stu Emery to prevent the workflow from firing when the Price Book changes or when a Price Book is added to the opportunity
rules.formula:
/* Only fire the workflow if a change is made to the "Is VE Needed" field, it is set to "true" and the previous value of this field was not "true" */
AND(ISCHANGED( Is_VE_Needed__c ), Is_VE_Needed__c = true, PRIORVALUE( Is_VE_Needed__c ) != true, NOT(BEGINS( RecordType.Name, "MTech")))

rules.description: Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-005898
HRM Existing Org Opportunity HRM New Org Opportunity HRM Sales

rules.fullName: Implementation Status is changed to true
rules.formula: AND ( ISCHANGED(AIP_Implementation_Status__c), AIP_Implementation_Status__c = true, OR ( RecordType.Name = "Amadeus AIP", RecordType.Name = "Sales Order" ) )

rules.fullName: Jennifer Trevino%3A Closed Lost%2C Closed Won%2C DNM Manager Alert_v%2E2
rules.description: Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-013952, Send e-mail to the Manager of the Opportunity Owner any Closed Won, Closed Lost or Closed DNM opportunities
rules.formula: AND(Owner.Manager.Alias = "jtrev",OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Won"),ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"),ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Did Not Materialize"DNM"')))

rules.description: Used to alert accounting, sales rep and sales management that an order that had missing pieces has now been cleard of all missing pieces.
Used to alert APAC accounting, sales rep and sales management that an order that had missing pieces has now been cleard of all missing pieces.
rules.formula: AND( Owner.Division = "APSG", ISPICKVAL(Missing_Pieces_Y_N__c, "Yes"), INCLUDES(Missing_Pieces__c, "None"), RecordType.Name <> "LOD Customer Opportunity", RecordType.Name <> "LOD Partner Order" )

rules.description: Alert to rep at Sales Stage=Approval that PO is required and not yet filled in
NICC-027116 - This workflow sets the Order Status field to "Complete" on Opportunities that have the "Partner" record type.

Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-010418; updated by NICC-052302
Send an e-mail to the Opportunity Owner and Opportunity Team Members when a Sales Order has been placed on hold by Accounting
Alert Contracts that an opportunity has potential rev rec issues.
Alert Project Office that Pricing Sheet is needed
When an opportunity is cloned, the Product Intake URL should not be cloned with the new opportunity
Need an email alert to be Resource that VE Assignment has changed
Set Pricing Sheet Completed to "No" when Pricing Sheet Needed = "Yes"
Set SOW Needed to "No" when SOW Completed = "Yes"

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8
rules.description: when an Opportunity is created where the account is on support hold and Oppty turned Closed Won NICC-051521

rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
rules.description: when an Opportunity is created where the account is on support hold and Oppty has been created NICC-051276 NICC-051521 NICC-051977

rules.fullName: Update %22Stage Prior to Close Lost%22 field

rules.description: When the Close Date on opportunity is updated, update the Approximate SFDC Go-Live Date field to close date + 90 if the Approximate SFDC Go-Live Date is earlier than the Close Date

rules.fullName: Update Close Date When Opportunity is Closed
rules.description: NICC-015810: Updates the "Close Date" to today's date when an opportunity "Stage" is changed to Closed Won or Closed Lost.
rules.formula: AND ( ISCHANGED(StageName), OR ( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ) )

rules.fullName: Value Proposition Related to Opp Record
rules.description: If at least one Value Proposition record is related to an opportunity record, check Value Proposition Created field. NICC- 024398.

tasks.description:
This opportunity needs processing!!
Thank you!!
tasks.subject: Contracts Request

tasks.description: A PO is required for this order. Please forward PO info to Contracts team.
tasks.subject: Get PO for Order

tasks.description: Notification of Sales Order to Subscription team completed, by automation, Integration User. Salesforce.com NICC - 022675
tasks.subject: HRM Notification Automated By Integration User
